queryName: Beta - Nifcloud RDB has public DB ingress security group rule
descriptionText: A `nifcloud_db_security_group` ingress security group rule allows traffic from `/0`. The rule parses `rule[].cidr_ip`, splitting on `/` and converting the suffix to a number; it flags when that numeric mask is less than 1, indicating a CIDR of `/0`. This represents an overly permissive `cidr` range that allows traffic from any IP address.
